MoveTo.Name: Going to talk to Corso Riggs

MoveTo.Name: Darmas Pollaran - killing some NPCs in the way
Darmas Pollaran - killing some NPCs in the way

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm Done on Coruscant! If you are not on your ship right now, get on it and complete 'Assault on the Works'. You will get the Quest 'Public Relations' for Port Raga. Next Step is to travel to Port Raga, restart the bot and load up [R - X] 17 Port Raga [C].xml quest profile (On Port Raga, not your ship)!

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm Done on Coruscant! If you are not on your ship right now, get on it and complete 'Race to the Ruins'. You will get the Quest 'New Intelligence' for the Planet Ord Mantell. Next Step is to travel to Ord Mantell, restart the bot and load up [R - X] 17 Ord Mantell [C].xml quest profile (on the Orbital station or planet itself)!

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm Done on Coruscant! If you are not on your ship right now, get on it and complete 'Race the Devil'. You will get the Quests 'Beryl's Bargain' for the Planet Taris and 'Nar Shaddaa Landing' for the Planet Nar Shaddaa. Next Step is to travel to Taris, restart the bot and load up that quest profile on the planet!
